transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, hello. Good afternoon, ma'am. I am Budhia Agency se bol rahi hu.
Customer: IndiaMART se bol rahi hu.
Executive: Good afternoon.
Customer: Ma'am aap IndiaMART se bol rahe hain?
Executive: Haan, IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Ma'am humne ek website banwaya hai Budhia Agency ka aur hamara IndiaMART mein Budhia Agency ka chalta bhi hai.
Executive: Kis naam se hai, ma'am, bataiyega?
Customer: Budhia Agency.
Executive: Aap spell karenge ek baar?
Customer: Budhia Agency.
Executive: Gudhia Agency?
Customer: Budhia Agency.
Executive: Ludhia Agency?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay, okay. Haan ji, ma'am, bataiye.
Customer: Haan, to mujhe aapne ek mail diya hua tha, abhi hum log site banaye hain. Usme aapke confirmation mail aaya tha ki wo mail mein ki jo aapne jo char mail diya hai wo confirm karna tha to wo kis ID se gaya hai mail ID se wo bata sakte hain kya?
Executive: Haan, main bata deti hu. Aapke paas jo mail aaya hoga na, aapki primary mail ID pe aaya hoga aur wo Rohit Razak ke naam se aaya hoga.
Customer: Kaun sa?
Executive: Rohit Razak ke naam se mail aaya hoga aapke paas.
Customer: Kitni tarikh se aaya hai?
Executive: Ma'am, abhi mere paas system to nahi hai to main wo to nahi aapko bata sakti. Kyunki aaj main leave par hu. Main kal aapko confirm karu kya?
Customer: Theek hai aur kyunki abhi call aaya tha wo confirm ke liye to mail actually hum log ka bhi office abhi khula hai to main mail kab aaya tha wo pata nahi chal pa raha hai. Next kuch din dijiyega please mujhe.
Executive: 29 October ko bhi to maine aapko mail ye share karaya tha.
Customer: 29 October ko?
Executive: Main aapko aap apna ek bari whatsapp number bolenge please?
Customer: 6287 number hai.
Executive: Ma'am actually aapne customer care pe call kiya hai na to mujhe aapka number leke hongi main. Yes, a second.
Executive: Abhi bataiyega.
Customer: 6287
Executive: 6287
Customer: 00
Executive: 00
Customer: 10
Executive: 10
Customer: 59
Executive: 59?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Dekhiye aapke paas whatsapp pe message aaya.
Customer: Whatsapp pe, ji.
Executive: Okay, ye dekhiye maine na aapko email ID di hai.
Customer: Ek second.
Customer: Isme to bahut sara hai.
Customer: Isme to sales service ye to hamara email ID hai.
Executive: Just a second.

Executive: Main na mail ID ke aage password likh rahi hu, theek hai? To aapko idea ho jayega ki aapki mail ID kya hai aur unke aage ki jo bhi passwords hai aap unko use kar sakte hai password change karne ke liye. And second thing
Customer: Nahi nahi wo nahi hongi aap. Main bol rahi hu mujhe confirmation mail aaya tha ki aapko ye mail abhi confirm karne ke liye aap reply dijiye to wo mail kis ID se aaya tha aap mujhe wo bataiye.
Executive: Wo to ma'am mujhe ek second.
Executive: Rohit Razak ke naam se aaya hoga ma'am.
Customer: Rohit Razak ke naam se aaya hoga.
Customer: Rohit. Theek hai main dekh leti hu. Theek hai 29 October ka mail hai 3 baje ka mail hai ye.
Customer: Main aapko ek ye forward karu. Isme na mujhe kuch changes karwani hai. Ye jo certificate hamare paas aaya hai na IndiaMART se ban ke TrustSeal free.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Dekhiye isme na changes karwana hai. Isme hamare director in fact title mein hamare CEO ka naam hai wo change karwana hai hamare hamare director ka naam Rahul hai to aap wo karwa dijiye na.
Executive: Okay to aap ek kaam kijiyega aap mujhe na GST certificate apna share kar dijiyega.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Ji, hello.
Executive: Ji sir.
Executive: Ma'am aap apna GST certificate mujhe whatsapp pe same pe share kar dijiye to main usko kal update karwa dungi.
Customer: Whatsapp pe?
Customer: Achha theek hai aapko GST send kar dete hain. To aap mujhe jo changes karwana hai na aap please changes kar dijiye.
Executive: Ma'am wo main change haan kal main confirm isko iske alava to koi issue nahi hai ma'am?
Customer: Nahi nahi aur wo aap Rohit Razak bataye na.
Executive: Haan Rohit Razak.
Customer: Okay. Theek hai to main yahan se call disconnect kar sakti hu aapka?
Customer: Ji theek hai aap kar dijiye and agar aap mujhe bata sakte ki kya mail ID hai to wo jyada achcha rehta. Mujhe
Executive: Maine mail ID maine aapko mail ID batai na Rohit.razak@indiamart.com hai.
Customer: Rohit.
Executive: Razak@indiamart.com hai.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
Executive: Okay ma'am, thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs confirmation mail ID.

- Wants changes in TrustSeal certificate.



Resolution:

- Provided mail ID of Rohit Razak.

- Asked to share GST certificate on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Changes in certificate will be done.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, gst, mail id, certificate
